title: 1st game- 500 ping, 2nd game- 40 Ping, 3rd game- 150 ping...
body:
I have struggled with this issue for weeks trying to troubleshoot it. Every game it seems I have a different latency and most of the time it is unplayable. The really weird part is that after playing quite a few games it seems to be more likely to be a low latency game. Of course the problem being that I have to play quite a few at 300 ping + to get there.

Other games run flawlessly and downloads are smooth.

My set up: 
Hardwired on Win 10 desktop PC
Arris DG1670A Combo modem/router With 5 ghz

Things I have tried:
Disabling Firewall
Disabling antivirus
Closing all applications that MAY EVEN CONSIDER downloading
Closing all VOIP services
Opening router options and checking mac addresses of all computers using wifi and turning them all off (No one hijaking connection)
Disabling wifi
Checking internet connections for packet loss (0%)
Using hextech repair tool.
I'm sure a million other things but they aren't coming to mind.

Any help is appreciated,
TheBlueSheepDog

replies.body: It looks like you've tried a lot of different steps, and it's interesting that you're not yielding packet loss despite the sudden changes.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  The repair tool should provide some logs that you can attach to the ticket for context.  We'll reply back asap!
Opened support ticket. Ill post outcome.
